reviews.name: HP Officejet 6812 e-All-in-One Printer/Copier/Scanner/Fax Machine
reviews.reviewText:
I wish I had known before I purchased this product that if it sets without being used for awhile it will go offline and there isn't a way to set it to online.

Worked well while I was printing, but after sitting about a month it will no longer work. Even HP doesn't have a fix.
reviews.title: Poor Design

reviews.name: HP Officejet 6812 e-All-in-One Printer/Copier/Scanner/Fax Machine
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this printer to replace an HP pohotosmart printer. It prints okay and is an okay printer for the price I paid, however, the photo quality and scan quality is not near as good as my old HP photosmart printer. It is a nice, basic printer but I would not recommend it for photo printing.
reviews.title: Not recommended for photo printing

reviews.name: HP Officejet 6812 e-All-in-One Printer/Copier/Scanner/Fax Machine
reviews.reviewText: This has everything, I can print from anywhere... Anywhere man... Prints fast, many Offers many cool easy features to user. Only had it a few weeks. Takes forever to start from plug in, but meant to never be unplugged only low power stand-by. = Power button that can be turned on remotely. Works for me.
reviews.title: First Printer in 4 years, technology is great!

reviews.name: HP Officejet 6812 e-All-in-One Printer/Copier/Scanner/Fax Machine
reviews.reviewText:
One of the better inkjet printers I've owned. I mail approximately 700 - 800 pieces per month. Holds more envelopes than most models, clean printing with adequate warning when ink(s) get low. Like most printers today, almost as cheap to throw away the printer and buy new one when ink runs out as this one has dropped in price to $109.

Not recommended for photo printing.
reviews.title: Great home office model!

reviews.name: HP Officejet 6812 e-All-in-One Printer/Copier/Scanner/Fax Machine
reviews.reviewText: Very efficient for home office. It really is a SMART machine!
reviews.title: Practical Choice
